SELECT a.keyId, a.equipmentName, u.userName, a.applyReason, DATE_FORMAT( a.applyTime, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS applyTime FROM equipment_apply_info a LEFT JOIN user_info u ON a.applyUserCode = u.userCode WHERE a.approvalStatusCode = 0
AND u.userName LIKE concat('%',#{userName},'%')
AND a.equipmentName LIKE concat('%',#{equipmentName},'%')
ORDER BY a.applyTime

SELECT a.equipmentName, a.equipmentType, u1.userName AS applyUser, a.applyReason, DATE_FORMAT( a.applyTime, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS applyTime, u2.userName AS approvalUser, DATE_FORMAT( a.approvalTime, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS approvalTime, d.dicValue AS receiveStatus, DATE_FORMAT( a.receiveTime, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS receiveTime FROM equipment_apply_info a LEFT JOIN user_info u1 ON a.applyUserCode = u1.userCode LEFT JOIN user_info u2 ON a.approvalUserCode = u2.userCode LEFT JOIN dictionary_info d ON d.dicTypeCode = 5 AND a.receiveStatusCode = d.dicCode WHERE a.approvalStatusCode = 1
AND u1.userName LIKE concat('%',#{applyUser},'%')
AND u2.userName LIKE concat('%',#{approvalUser},'%')
AND a.equipmentName LIKE concat('%',#{equipmentName},'%')
AND a.equipmentType LIKE concat('%',#{equipmentType},'%')
AND a.receiveStatusCode = #{receiveStatusCode}
ORDER BY a.approvalTime DESC, a.receiveTime DESC

SELECT a.equipmentName, u1.userName AS applyUser, a.applyReason, DATE_FORMAT( a.applyTime, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS applyTime, u2.userName AS approvalUser, a.approvalLog, DATE_FORMAT( a.approvalTime, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS approvalTime FROM equipment_apply_info a LEFT JOIN user_info u1 ON a.applyUserCode = u1.userCode LEFT JOIN user_info u2 ON a.approvalUserCode = u2.userCode WHERE a.approvalStatusCode = 2
AND u1.userName LIKE concat('%',#{applyUser},'%')
AND u2.userName LIKE concat('%',#{approvalUser},'%')
AND a.equipmentName LIKE concat('%',#{equipmentName},'%')
ORDER BY a.approvalTime DESC
